content: it s hip to be square with this adorable crochet dog coat made of granny squares it s never been easier to crochet your favorite motif using red heart all in one granny square - a yarn that does all the colorwork for you practice single_crochet slip_stitch half_double_crochet and more no need to change the colors of yarn available in a range of sizes it s the perfect way to keep your pup toasty red heart® all in one™ granny square™ 8 8 oz/250 g 417 yds/381 m gauge motif = approx 6 15 cm square
